title: Find Him
description: This project is a 2D puzzle game inspired by the classic Sokoban style. What’s new? Some boxes can move automatically, increasing the challenge. Fortunately, you play as a small marionette with the power to stop time for brief moments. Your goal is to escape the tower before it collapses.
